reviews.review_msg: Very intelligent prof and is amazing at explaining things and ensuring that the class is with him. Emphasises experiments that go along with the concepts that he teaches and you will have to memorise all the experiments (at least one) related to that particular concept in order to explain it on the exam. Very clear marker, outlines what he wants.

Initially great. But then 1) didn't mark most of our work, left it to a TA, didn't tell us what we did wrong, 2) was always weirdly condescending answering q's, 3) biggest: his entire course could be taught in a week if not for him explaining a crazy number of totally useless experiments that we needed to rote memorize. Concepts > experiments man.
